definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 寿被赋予慈溪太后她皇后绣挂毯，八老庆祝生日。

sentences.english: These are the threads that weave the tapestry of humanity’s story.
sentences.chinese: 它们是编织人类历史挂毯的丝线。

sentences.english: One evening she was staring vacantly at an embroidered hanging.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上，她茫然地凝视着一张挂毯。

sentences.english: One remembered where there used to be a picture or a carpet, or a secretaire.
sentences.chinese: 有人记得那里曾经有一张图画或挂毯，或写字台。

sentences.english: Art tapestry, expressing brightness and harmony in colour, adds attraction to your room.
sentences.chinese: 艺术挂毯，用色彩来表现明快和谐，为您的居室增辉。

sentences.english: They are like black holes burnt by torches in a tapestry of Tyre.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像提尔挂毯上烧出来的黑洞。

sentences.english: Silk tapestry, top grade gift, rare collection.
sentences.chinese: 真丝挂毯，高档礼品，稀世藏品。

sentences.english: The art filigree tapestry is elegant and magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 嵌金银丝艺术挂毯，绚丽雅典。
您听说过本公司的挂毯吗？

sentences.english: You will love the embroideries and tapestries put on display here.
sentences.chinese: 你会爱刺绣，挂毯张贴在这里。

sentences.english: One famous example of embroidery work is called the Bayeux Tapestry.
sentences.chinese: 绣工的一个著名的例子是所谓的贝叶挂毯。

sentences.english: You've caught a cold from standing in that damp tapestried room.
sentences.chinese: 你站在那潮湿的挂毯室里着了凉了。

sentences.english: On the tapestry are depicted some biblical scenes.
sentences.chinese: 挂毯上画着一些《圣经》上的场景。
阳光把挂毯晒得褪了色。

sentences.english: What does the Bayeux Tapestry show?
sentences.chinese: 贝叶挂毯上显示是什么？
